name: Classic Caesar Salad
description: A traditional Caesar salad made with crisp romaine lettuce, hard-boiled eggs, grated Parmesan cheese, and grilled chicken breast fillets.

name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
description: A flavorful twist on the classic Caesar salad featuring grilled chicken breast fillets, crisp lettuce, shaved Parmesan cheese, and a tangy Caesar dressing.

name: Vegetarian Caesar Salad
description: A vegetarian version of the classic Caesar salad made with fresh lettuce, hard-boiled eggs, shaved Parmesan cheese, and a creamy dressing.
